com.jack.dicewars.dice_wars.game

Class Territory

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.jack.dicewars.dice_wars.game.Territory

  • public class Territory
extends java.lang.Object
    Created by Jack Mueller on 2/23/15. A Territory is the smallest division that can be owned by a Player in DiceWars. Ownership can change rapidly; In fact owning all Territories is the win condition of a game. A Territory has a value and a Player owner, which can be null. The territory inherits its color from its owner.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Territory(Player owner, int value)
      Creates an isolated territory that keeps track of it's owner and dice value.

        Creates an isolated territory that keeps track of it's owner and dice value.

      • getValue

        public int getValue()
        How many dice the owner can use when attacking from and defending this Territory. Will be non-negative.
        Returns:
        The number of dice on this Territory.

      • setValue
